objective_timed: Score as many points as you can before time runs out
objective_unlimited: Score as many points as you can before the board fills up
objective_game_walls: Score {quantity} Shapes in {time_limit} seconds.  Avoid the walls that are in your way
objective_game_clear: Clear all {quantity} shapes off the board in {time_limit} seconds
objective_game_max: Don't let more than {quantity} shapes remain on the board for {time_limit} seconds
tutorial_intro:
Welcome to Flik!
How about a quick tutorial first?
tutorial_text:
Move the piece to
 its matching color
tutorial_exit:
Awesome!
 Now for a real challenge...
store_purchase_description:
Play more games to get more
 points or purchase some below
error_load_failed: Failed to load %s. Please check your network connection and try again.
